name: microsoft-windows-security
author: Fulcrum Technology Solutions
description: A bundle of templates for Microsoft Windows Security event logs, supporting XML event formats.

templates.name: Kerberos Authentication Ticket Request
templates.description: Windows Security Auditing event for Kerberos Authentication Ticket Request (Event ID 4768)

templates.name: Kerberos Authentication Failed
templates.description: Windows Security Auditing event for Kerberos Authentication Service Ticket Failed (Event ID 4771)

templates.name: Privilege Use
templates.description: Windows Security events for privilege use

templates.name: Process Creation
templates.description: Windows Security events for process creation (EventID 4688)
